name: Roll of the Defence
description:
Roll Of the Defense  is a dicey Tower Defense.

Roll dices to get different structures or leave the explosions of the battlefield re roll the dice if you don't like the result. Try to survive to the end of the Wave 10 on map that are each time different

Control: 

Arrow to move the Camera.

Mouse to interact with the game.

Buildings :

Wall: Can block projectiles

Turet: fire at Ennemy   -2 Power

Artililerie :Fire at Ennemys -5Power

SolarPanel: Generate  Power +7Power

DiceExtractor : Generate new dice-5 Power

You can Check and Downloads the 3D Model on my Sketchfabs Page!

 https://sketchfab.com/popote1
